The dynamite pairing of Buddy and Josh help carry the Timberwolves to the state championship. All is well until two wicked Russian circus owners show up to dognap Buddy to be their star attraction. A movie that is a touchdown for the entire family!

programme.title: Baby On Board
programme.desc: Angela Marks, an ambitious, image-conscious businesswoman working for over-demanding boss Mary. When Angela becomes unexpectedly pregnant at the peak of her career, her life with her divorce attorney husband, Curtis, is turned upside-down. An inconvenient pregnancy leads to a nine-month roller coaster ride as Angela and Curtis try to cope and the interference of best friends Danny and Sylvia escalate the situation into a full-on battle of the sexes...

programme.title: Tyler Perry presents Peeples
programme.desc: After secretly dating for several months, Wade Walker decides it’s time to meet Grace’s rich relations. When Wade crashes the Peeples’ annual family reunion in the ultra-posh Hamptons, this fish-out-of-water comes dangerously close to being given the hook. But Wade refuses to let himself flounder as he employs all his charms to land a place in the family’s heart in this madcap film filled with fun, dysfunction, and hilarious surprises.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: Entanglement' is a charmingly quirky romantic comedy with a twist! While searching for the meaning of his existence, Ben Layton (Thomas Middleditch: 'Silicon Valley') uncovers a family secret that leads him to a woman named Hanna (Jess Weixler: 'The Good Wife') who might have almost been his adopted sister. But when he and Hanna inadvertently fall in love, and his life becomes increasingly and weirdly complicated, Ben starts to realise that everything is incredibly connected and love may give him a new lease on life.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Cromwells Head
programme.desc: The story of Oliver Cromwell's head is perhaps the most bizarre, yet least well known, of all tales from English history. From regal burial, to exhumation and decapitation, this relic of our only non-royal ruler has travelled a most peculiar path.

programme.title: Great British Aircraft
programme.desc: Britain has always played a very important role in the aeronautic industry, from Sir George Cayley who designed the first actual model of an aeroplane to Sir Frank Whittle who is credited with single handedly inventing the turbojet engine.

programme.title: Nation On Fire
programme.desc: Kyiv, the Ukrainian capital, has been gripped by unrest in recent times. This is a unique portrait of a nation in suspense, a nation in fear, a nation in waiting. A rare and exclusive snapshot of the days after the riots but before the storm.

programme.title: The Plastic Whales of Amsterdam
programme.desc: We're all aware that we need to reuse our plastic, but one entrepreneur took it to the extreme. When the Amsterdam canals were becoming too clogged with plastic, Marius Smit founded the Plastic Whale, a boat made out of plastic with the sole purpose of fishing for more.

programme.title: Bombing war : from Guernica to Hiroshima
programme.desc: The film takes us around the entire world, as no region was spared : the free countries, such as those occupied by Axis forces, as well as Italy, Germany and Japan. Seen from the skies, the war is revealed in a new light. It began in 1937 when Guernica and the Chinese cities of Chongqing and Shanghai were devastated by bombs and ended in August 1945 when the Americans dropped the first atomic on Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

programme.title: Bombing war : from Guernica to Hiroshima
programme.desc: The film takes us around the entire world, as no region was spared : the free countries, such as those occupied by Axis forces, as well as Italy, Germany and Japan. programme.title: Adopted by Dolphins - Flipper's Family Secrets
programme.desc: Adopted by Dolphins' follows a group of researchers who are accepted as companions by bottlenose dolphins in the Red Sea. A group of divers and marine biologists accompany up to 100 wild dolphins for days and for the very first time watch their behaviour from a dolphin’s perspective. Willingly, the animals expose their social behaviour and games, their exciting love life and even the use of medical substances provided by corals. This is a capturing story of love, war and drama.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: A Simpler Way : Crisis As Opportunity
programme.desc: A feature-length documentary that follows a community in Australia who came together to explore and demonstrate a simpler way to live in response to global crises. Throughout the year the group build tiny houses, plant veggie gardens, practice simple living, and discover the challenges of living in community.

programme.title: Karun
programme.desc: Karun: Misadventures On Iran’s Longest River' - British adventurers Tom Allen and Leon McCarron set out to follow Iran’s longest river, the Karun, by human powered means. Their aim is to go beyond the politics and explore the culture and geography of this most misunderstood of nations and have a great adventure doing so. But despite Tom’s previous experience of travel in Iran, they find that cultural differences run deeper than they’d realised.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Redesign My Brain | Season 2 | Episode 1
programme.desc: In episode one, Help Me Adapt, Todd uses the latest science to train his brain to become more adaptable. To prove that it’s possible, he risks his life rock climbing blindfolded up a rock-face in Utah’s Moab Desert. He ascends the 120-metre corkscrew summit of the Ancient Art Tower, a feat never before attempted without sight, after only six weeks of training.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China | Season 1 | Episode 2
programme.desc: SerpentZA and Laowhy86 rack up the miles as they travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They spend the night in a themed sex hotel, explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Nicholas And Alexandra The Letters Episode 1
programme.desc: Desde sus brutales asesinatos hace cien años, el mundo ha estado fascinado por el zar Nicolás II y su esposa, la emperatriz Alexandra. A través de las cartas políticamente condenatorias, sexualmente íntimas y personalmente reveladoras de la pareja, este docu-drama de dos partes, presentado por la Dra. Suzannah Lipscomb, explora la compleja historia de amor de Nicholas y Alexandra y el papel de la pareja en el período previo a la Revolución Rusa que llevó a su ejecuciones trágicas.

programme.title: Australia's Camel Man

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Limping Assassin S01 E01
programme.desc: It’s the Commonwealth Conference in Scotland, but there’s intelligence that suggests a planned assassination attempt on The Queen. Taking his new role very seriously, Hubble soon manages to upset foreign ambassadors, colleagues, hotel guests and even the restaurant pianist as he haphazardly carries out his security checks. An attractive woman spells trouble as he gives away vital security information – and soon has to go all out to save her Majesty

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: Bullets Over Broad Street S01 E02
programme.desc: Hubble enlists the help of his aspirant sniffer dog Winston as he continues in his new role of Royal Bodyguard. It’s the Queen’s birthday, but Hubble soon stumbles into calamity and is forced to take a few days break at a health spa – where he comes across a familiar face and his planned relaxation is suddenly shelved. Hubble returns to duty in time to oversee Her Majesty’s visit to an Oxford Museum, which is far from straightforward.

programme.title: Funnymals: Episode 3
programme.desc: Funnymals is a light entertainment sketch show involving wildlife clips with witty and comical voice-overs. Packed with cheeky animals, Funnymals will amuse the whole family! High quality footage is selected from HD wildlife archives, and combined with witty and comical voice overs.

programme.title: Soundtrack to Sixteen
programme.desc: Soundtrack to Sixteen is a coming-of-age film about two anxious teens growing up in London in the 2000s. Maisy is self-conscious and constantly overanalysing. She is obsessed with having her first kiss this year, before she turns seventeen, but stalking the boy next door doesn't seem to be working. Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

programme.title: Finding Joy
programme.desc: A struggling writer rediscovers himself, his offbeat family, and what it means to be happy when he meets Joy – a spirited, possibly-dying young woman who asks him to write her obituary.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Limping Assassin S01 E01
programme.desc: It’s the Commonwealth Conference in Scotland, but there’s intelligence that suggests a planned assassination attempt on The Queen. Taking his new role very seriously, Hubble soon manages to upset foreign ambassadors, colleagues, hotel guests and even the restaurant pianist as he haphazardly carries out his security checks. An attractive woman spells trouble as he gives away vital security information – and soon has to go all out to save her Majesty

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: Bullets Over Broad Street S01 E02
programme.desc: Hubble enlists the help of his aspirant sniffer dog Winston as he continues in his new role of Royal Bodyguard. It’s the Queen’s birthday, but Hubble soon stumbles into calamity and is forced to take a few days break at a health spa – where he comes across a familiar face and his planned relaxation is suddenly shelved. Hubble returns to duty in time to oversee Her Majesty’s visit to an Oxford Museum, which is far from straightforward.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Siege of Blenheim Square S01 E03
programme.desc: A routine shopping trip for a Prince turns into a potentially dangerous siege after a misunderstanding between Hubble and a member of the Prince’s protection team. As negotiations get underway Hubble only seems to be able to worsen the situation. Despite this, he plans his own personal rescue mission.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Royal Art of Blackmail S01 E04
programme.desc: There’s been a burglary at the Palace and The Queen enlists Hubble to source its culprit. But there is more concern when it appears that the thieves were unwittingly assisted by Hubble, much to Dennis’s joy.David Walliams (Little Britain, Come Fly with Me) joins us in this episode. Guy’s endeavours to make things right put him in a sticky situation.

programme.title: Jack Rio
programme.desc: A famous actor in Los Angeles tries to escape his on-screen persona, the T.V. character that has made him famous, and find himself again, while a string of murders seem to follow in his wake. Is it the work of an obsessed fan? Or something far worse?

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With The Needle Through The Hand- Jonathan Pendragon shows international superstar Ronn Moss his "feet" of magic! Plus Trigg Watson and his tablet of wonder turns images into reality, Eric Ross actually shoves a needle through his hand, Michael Turco re-creates the daily news, Rich Manley leaves a burning impression and Michael Grandinetti levitates himself over Hollywood Boulevard completely surrounded by a hundred witnesses.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: Nation of Language talk about their newfound exposure during the pandemic and new album. Kah-Lo talks about growing as an artist and plans for new music. Zella Day performs live and more.

programme.title: The World's Funniest Halloween Moments Hour
programme.desc: Join us for our special Halloween edition of funny pranks, viral videos, fun movies and John Ross' $1000 Challenge.

programme.title: World War Four
programme.desc: A series of escalating incidents around the world lead to greater and greater conflict, placing the superpowers at one another's throats. Armies march, bombs rain down, soldiers storm the beaches. One family is caught up in the ever-growing conflict. Can they survive as total war is declared and nuclear weapons are unleashed

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Sydney- Sydney Harbor, a sightseeing cruise followed by a fast jet boat ride that makes some exciting 360 spins under the Harbour bridge. Laura climbs to the top of the Sydney Harbour Bridge - a once-in-a-lifetime experience indeed - before she visits her favorite attraction, the legendary Sydney Opera House. Numerous first-rate attractions, world-class museums, excellent shopping, and a year-round calendar of free outdoor events.

programme.desc: It is often said a family that plays together stays together. All it really means is a family that spends time together will have a close bond and a lasting relationship. Thus we’ve selected remarkably Family films that tug at your heart as long as you watch them with your family.

programme.title: Documentary
programme.desc: TAILING POND a powerful documentary about an unsettling expose of the terrible human cost of India’s decades long nuclear programme, narrated by Cynthia Nixon, and other Iconic selection of Documentary films.

programme.title: QT8: The First Eight
programme.desc: There will always be blood, brilliance and controversy. Shedding new light on the life and legacy of the legendary Quentin Tarantino, this documentary gives unprecedented access to his vision throughout his career. Featuring interviews with his contemporaries, former cast members and industry experts, including Samuel L. Jackson, Jamie Foxx, Kurt Russell, Christoph Waltz and more.

programme.title: Hello Carter
programme.desc: This witty, charming, feel-good comedy, stars Jodie Whittaker (Doctor Who) and Charlie Cox (Daredevil). Carter is a homeless, unemployed, single, twenty-something Londoner. Desperate to get his life back on track, he wants to win back his elusive ex-girlfriend Kelly (Annabelle Wallis), but learns that the road to happiness can be unpredictable, unconventional and unbelievably funny

programme.title: Love Birds
programme.desc: Recently dumped and wallowing in self-pity, Doug finds an injured duck. With the assistance of Holly, an eccentric young vet and bird specialist, Doug decides to nurse the ‘not-duck’ back to health and love blossoms between him and Holly. However, things never run smoothly in Doug’s world.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Nothing is black or white in this heart-wrenching drama about love, race and forgiveness. Starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle, leaving Eloise not only torn between two families but two worlds.

programme.title: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Comedy legend Robin Williams and Mila Kunis are on fantastic form in this story of lies, lust and love. When a doctor mistakenly diagnoses Henry as having 90 minutes to live, he begins a wildly funny journey to make amends with his family and friends. Featuring eye-wateringly entertaining performances from Peter Dinklage and Melissa Leo, this is a hilarious story of anger management in action!

programme.title: Monk Little Dog - Season 1 - Episodes 43-52
programme.desc: Monk on mission impossible Monk, master of ceremonies Monk plays golf Monk plays video games Monk crashes a dinner party Monk, the movie star We’ve lost Monk Monk, the superhero Monk, Quack-Quack & Little Chick Monk investigates Monk is a jovial little dog who obstinately tries his best but always fails! When thins aren’t working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Things can get totally out of control real fast! Director/creator: Sungjae Kim, Natalys Raut Sieuzac, Suhoon Kim

programme.title: Zumbers - Season 1 - Episodes 127-133
programme.desc: Shark | Picture | Skids | Toilet | Toothpaste | Hose | Shovel Five characters, accompanied by their inseparable vehicle-gadget, sets out on a journey where the main purpose is to eat, one by one, the delicious round pastries scattered around the garden.

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 16-18
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a Whale Louie, Draw Me a Crab Louie, Draw Me a Flying Saucer Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Boom & Reds - Season 1 - Episodes 37-42
programme.desc: From episode 37 to 42 The Reds are tiny creatures who are part of a community that lives together in a tree belonging to a fantastic world. The Reds love to gather and draw pictures and in each chapter, the ogre Boom has to guess what the Reds are drawing on the ground.

programme.title: Bugged - Season 1 - Episodes 37-39
programme.desc: Jurassic Puck Between the earth and the sky Dumb luck Follow our hero Murphy in his doomed quest to capture the ultimate prize: a bug called Puck. But, for Murphy, nothing ever works the way it should and he has big competition: Blat Jack, a super bounty hunter. Everything that can go wrong will go wrong! Relive the glory days of burlesque cartoons!

programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 39-40
programme.desc: Birdsong Dinosaur Trail Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

programme.title: Molang - Season 1 - Episodes 8-14
programme.desc: The Goldfish The Beach The Fishing Trip The Campers The Television The Sleepless Night The Second-hand Market Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Telmo and Tula, Arts & Crafts - Season 1 - Episodes 49-52
programme.desc: Pencil Box | Tic Tac toe | Guitar | Pillow In this new session of Telmo and Tula, our little friends will teach us, easily and with materials available to everyone, how to make crafts and toys in the most fun and simple way possible.

programme.title: Boom & Reds - Season 1 - Episodes 7-12
programme.desc: From episode 7 to 12 The Reds are tiny creatures who are part of a community that lives together in a tree belonging to a fantastic world. The Reds love to gather and draw pictures and in each chapter, the ogre Boom has to guess what the Reds are drawing on the ground.

programme.title: Nuts Nuts Nuts - Season 1 - Episodes 1-7
programme.desc: The well Titanic The brambles The plater lift The Buoy The chairlift The circus Nuts is an obsessed, clumsy blue squirrel. He lives with other animals in a crazy, lively, funny and sometimes absurd world. Wherever he goes, he causes disasters…

programme.title: Green Light - Season 1 - Episodes 1-4
programme.desc: Pedestrian traffic lights | Seat belt | Getting out of the car | Traffic police How do you have to cross the street? How do you have to go by bicycle? Those, and many other basic rules of Road Safety, will be taught to the youngest, by a master-police officer and his inseparable Lucio, with visual examples of what happens if things are done well and what happens if they are done badly.

programme.title: Raindrop - Season 1 - Raindrop's Birth
programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. Surrounded by her friends Vaporón (a cloud) and Frigote (a cube of ice), she will live many adventures and defeat a germ, the evil bacteria, in her attempt to destroy the environment

programme.title: Munki and Trunk - Season 1 - Episodes 28-30
programme.desc: Bee Plot | Chain Reaction | Unidentified Crawling Object Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.desc: Queen Of The Swingers | Prickly Situation | Sweet Mayhem Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a Mouse Louie, Draw Me a Crane Louie, Draw Me a Submarine Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Telmo and Tula, Arts & Crafts - Season 1 - Episodes 43-45
programme.desc: Castle | Puzzle | Drums In this new session of Telmo and Tula, our little friends will teach us, easily and with materials available to everyone, how to make crafts and toys in the most fun and simple way possible.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Full of shock turns, moments of horrific injury, polar bear action and tense emotional scenes, Arctic will keep your hands clenched to your chair until its brilliant, breathless conclusion. Mads Mikkelsen gives a tour de force performance as a pilot whose plane has crashed in a remote corner of the Arctic. Stranded in the wilderness he uses his ingenuity to survive. When about to receive his long-awaited rescue, an explosive accident means his opportunity is lost and the dire situation further complicated. The tragic turn of events, involving another crash survivor forces the pilot to make a perilous choice between the relative safety of his camp and a deadly trek into the unknown.

programme.title: Working Girl
programme.desc: A high-priced call girl navigates the shadowy world of London’s sex trade in this provocative erotic thriller. Virginie (César Award winner Hafsia Herzi) goes about her work as a prostitute with a cool detachment, trading sex with wealthy businessmen for money, but never getting emotionally involved. That all changes when she meets Rupert (Ash Stymest), an enigmatic stranger with unclear intentions. Risking everything, Virginie plunges into a dangerous affair that tears her between a ruthless madam who forbids romantic attachments and a dark, sexy man who could be her saviour or her downfall.

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: When his perfect world crashes down around him, Ben Kalmen (Michael Douglas) is forced to pick up the pieces and start his quest for success all over again. Once a successful car dealership owner, he embarks on a major comeback but old habits die hard. Once again threatening both his career and family, Ben must learn to control his ongoing lust for every attractive woman he sees, especially one whose influential family connections could make or break his latest business plan.

programme.title: Two Lovers
programme.desc: Leonard is an attractive but troubled young man living with his parents in suburban Brooklyn when two women enter his life. The lovely but ordinary daughter of his father’s new business partner and his beautiful but volatile neighbour trapped in a destructive affair, whose passion helps to reignite his lust for life.

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: Paul is a teenager caught up in the rave scene of 90s Paris, rubbing shoulders with future greats, Daft Punk. After forming a DJ duo of his own, Paul’s dedication to the music he loves sees him travel the world at the forefront of a musical revolution. But as the hedonism of his youth gives way to the reality of his advancing years, Paul must choose between his dreams and responsibilities.

programme.title: Ninja: Shadow Of A Tear
programme.desc: Scott Adkins returns as Casey Bowman, who is now the sensei of a successful dojo, married to the beautiful Namiko, and expecting their first baby. But when Casey returns home one day to find someone has brutally killed Namiko and their unborn child, bereft, Casey has only one thing left to live for…Revenge.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: John Travolta, Morgan Freeman, Famke Janssen, and Brendan Fraser lend their talents to this searing detective thriller. Travolta plays Carson Philips, a hard-drinking L.A. private eye, who takes a case in his old hometown of Galveston, Texas. While searching for a missing woman, Philips must confront a crime boss, a shady doctor, a sexy club singer, his former lover — and his own dark, disturbing past.

programme.title: 15 Minutes of War
programme.desc: Based on one of the most heroic missions ever told. A group of Somalian rebels hijack a school bus carrying twenty-one French children and an American teacher (Olga Kurylenko: 'Quantum of Solace'), and drive it to no-man’s-land, on the Somali border. French captain André Gerval ('Taken') is called to lead a team of elite snipers to secretly prepare an emergency rescue. With time running out, Gerval and his team take sole responsibility of carrying out a simultaneous five-men sniper attack to get the children and their teacher out safely. A shocking true story.

programme.title: I Am Soldier
programme.desc: I Am Soldier follows Mickey Tomlinson (Tom Hughes), a military chef, who attempts the most dangerous military selection known to man: The Special Air Service selection. The S.A.S. is the United Kingdom’s most renowned Special Forces Regiment, tasked with life threatening missions in some of the most dangerous places on the planet. Mickey has more military experience than simply being a chef, something he doesn’t let on to the other candidates… Mickey is smashed by this selection process – his mind, body and soul scream for mercy as he endures torturous speed-marches over the steepest mountains, running for his life during ‘Escape and Evasion’...
